sources.title: 1976 - Bruce Lee. The Legend - Biography Documentary - Directed by Ng See-yuen
sources.description:
The film recounts the life of Bruce Lee (Ho Chung-tao), starting with his departure from Hong Kong to attend the University of Seattle. Most of the significant milestones in his life (his role in the series The Green Hornet, his marriage to Linda Lee, his meteoric film career in Hong Kong, and his sudden death in Betty Ting Pei’s apartment) are covered, with a slightly closer adherence to the truth than in previous Lee biopics.

Directed by Ng See-yuen
